review.comment: Top notch job on all the details they addressed on my car. Great and friendly customer service. Recommend  them highly and won’t hesitate to use them again!
review.review_reply: Thank you Kathy!  We are so glad you came to us, and thank you for the great review!

review.comment: My car had a lot of fine scratches and a couple spots that were down to the metal.  The exterior shines beautifully now.  My inside mats are light tan and one mat had a terrible stain, they got that out as well.  We had full detail, paint correction, and ceramic coat.  Thank you Pro Auto Spas.  We will be back.
review.review_reply: Kristy, we are thrilled that you are pleased! Thank you for allowing us to the opportunity to make your car beautiful again. See you next time!

review.comment: They do an awesome job on my subie very professional! I won't take it anywhere else to get detailed!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much!  Kenny is nuts about subie's so he had a really good time working on yours.

review.comment: Brought my subaru in for an interior detail/ceramic coating, and I was absolutely blown away with the result
review.review_reply: We are so happy you were pleased with our work!  Thank you for letting us know about it!

review.comment: I have taken two of my cars here to be detailed, minor paint correction, and ceramic coating. Both of my cars came back looking fantastic!! My wife and I are beyond thrilled with how the cars came back to us! The ceramic coating has helped with all the dust and dirt we have being blown around constantly. Kenneth was very helpful and informative when asking questions. I would recommend his work to anyone!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much!  We really think Kenny is the best ceramic coating specialist in town, and we are so glad you were happy with our work!  Feel free to post pictures if you'd like.
Thank you Christian!  We appreciate all the stars!

review.comment: Absolutely wonderful customer service, great environment, and no doubt the best detailing service offered in Amarillo, highly recommended The Pro Auto Spa for all your detailing needs!!
review.review_reply: Wow Easton--thank you so much for the kind words!  Thanks you for trusting us with your ride!

review.comment: Best detail shop in town i will always bring my car back to them they are very careful and treated my car like their own. My car looks brand new again
review.review_reply: Thank you Thomas, that's our goal.  I am so glad we could do that for you!

review.comment: Very professional! They got us in and out quickly and did a wonderful job!
review.review_reply: Thank you Brittany! We really appreciate your kind words and look forward to working with you again.

review.comment:
Took my vehicle in for a professional detail and paint restoration. When I got my vehicle back it looked better than new.
Kenneth and his crew at Pro Auto Spas did an impeccable job on my car and I could not be happier with the results.
If you have vehicle that needs a little TLC, I’d highly recommend taking it by Pro Auto Spas.
Kenneth and his crew ROCK!
Thanks much guys for the “show car” look you gave my GT 500!
Absolutely love it.
review.review_reply: Thank you Matthew!  We appreciate working on such spectacular vehicles!

review.comment: Kenneth and his team did an amazing job on my black car that needed serious paint correction. Good communication, things done when promised, and amazing work overall.
review.review_reply: Your car is seriously gorgeous!  Thank you for letting us put some extra shine and protection on it!!!  Like working on a masterpiece!!

review.comment: Love this place, need a car detail done these are your guys. Super chill group.
review.review_reply: Thank you Ninja!

review.comment: Kenny did a great job, would definitely recommend to anyone wanted to get a top quality detailing job done.
review.review_reply: We think Kenny is the best, I am so glad you like his work!

review.comment: Kenny did a great job on my daughters car! It was pretty bad when we brought it in… He steam cleaned it, and completely detailed it! It looks so much better, and smells so much better! Highly recommend this business!
review.review_reply: Thank you Janae--we're so happy you were pleased with our work!!

review.comment: Phenomenal job detailing and removing scratches from outside of car! Looks amazing!
review.review_reply: Thank you Brennan--we are SO glad we could help.  This is an awesome looking car and we were thrilled to get the scratches out.
Thank you so much, we are so glad we did a good job for you!
Thank you for the feedback!  We strive to achieve excellence with each and every customer,  and we regret that we did not earn 5 stars from you.  We will definitely try harder next time!
Thank you so much for the great rating--it's a pleasure doing business with ya'll!

review.comment: Kenny is a absolute magician of the auto care world! The previous owner of my vehicle did not take care of the paint as well as they should have. My vehicle was left with swirl marks from drive threw car washes and he made it show room ready! Very knowledgeable and personable! Super happy and water spots are nonexistent!
review.review_reply: We do our best--we are so happy you're pleased with your results!  And yes, Kenny is a wizard.  Thanks for sharing with us!

review.comment: Hey guys my man Kenny is Incredible! I live in Houston but I’m really big until the show car and auction scene, anytime I have a new project that I just finished up and need a phenomenal detailing job I call up my guys at Pro Auto Spa !
review.review_reply: Thank you Khalil!
Thank you Carrie--your opinion matters!!

review.comment: If your cars a 2010, it’ll leave looking like a 2022
review.review_reply: Thank you Michael!  We are so glad we did such a good job for you!

review.comment: What can I say! Kenneth was incredible! I brought my car in because it had paint swirls from the factory and he literally made it look Better than new! Super happy with my results! I can't believe how bad the car looked from the factory, I couldn't tell until he worked his magic!
review.review_reply: John, we are so glad we could help perfect your new ride!  Thanks for letting us know, and please keep in touch!
Alize, thank you for the 5 stars!  Please contact us for anything you might need to keep your car spotless and sparkling!
